name: Mini Aquarium
description:
Controls:

1. Left click to place food, hold to move food.

2. You can move placed food by clicking and holding the left mouse button on them.

Food will disappear after a while (each type of food have their own fullness rating and different time taken to disappear)

3. Middle mouse hold on the blue and red circle to move them.

Blue is for the grey fish to pursuit, red is for them to avoid.

4. Right click in fish detection area to make fish flee.

5. Spawn fish button spawns max of 5 fish (at default, can be changed in inspector).

6. Change food button is for changing the food type.
